mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message(chat_room_id, user_id, content, message_type, created_at, file_url) VALUES(#{chatRoomId}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{messageType}, NOW(), #{fileUrl})
mapper.select: SELECT m.message_id AS messageId, m.chat_room_id AS chatRoomId, m.user_id AS userId, u.nickname AS nickname, u.profile_img AS profileImg, m.content, m.message_type AS messageType, m.created_at AS createdAt, m.file_url AS fileUrl FROM message m JOIN user u ON m.user_id = u.user_id WHERE m.chat_room_id = #{chatRoomId} ORDER BY m.created_at ASC
